mapper.sql: select id, enable, create_by as "createBy", create_time "createTime", update_by as "updateBy", update_time as "updateTime", remark, sort, name, address, start_time as "startTime", end_time as "endTime", contact_person as "contactPerson", phone, introduction, integral, sign_in as "signIn", sign_qr as "signQr", signout_qr as "signoutQr", status, reason,user_type as "userType",headFigure,belonging_community as "belongingCommunity",belonging_unit as "belongingUnit" from activity
mapper.select:
enable = 1
and status = #{status}
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and #{date} < start_time
and #{date} between start_time and end_time
and #{date} > end_time
and cid = #{cid}
and contact_person like CONCAT('%',#{contactPerson},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
ORDER BY update_time DESC

select id,name,headFigure,update_time as "createTime" from activity where status = 1 and enable = 1 and(#{date} between start_time and end_time or #{date} < start_time) ORDER BY update_time DESC Limit 0,4

select a.name as "name",a.reason,a.create_time as "createTime",'1' as type from activity a where a.enable = 1 and a.create_by = #{userId} and a.status = 2 UNION ALL select d.content as "name",d.reason,d.create_time as "createTime",'2' as type from demand d where d.enable = 1 and d.create_by = #{userId} and d.status = 2 UNION ALL select r.name,r.reason,r.create_time as "createTime",'3' as type from resources r where r.enable = 1 and r.create_by = #{userId} and r.status = 2 UNION ALL select m.name,m.reason,m.create_time as "createTime",'4' as type from merchant m where m.enable = 1 and m.create_by = #{userId} and m.status = 2 UNION ALL select p.name,p.reason,p.create_time as "createTime",'5' as type from project p where p.enable = 1 and p.create_by = #{userId} and p.status = 2 ORDER BY createTime DESC

select a.name as "name",a.reason,a.create_time as "createTime" ,'1' as type from activity a where a.enable = 1 and a.status = 2 UNION ALL select d.content as "name",d.reason,d.create_time as "createTime" ,'2' as type from demand d where d.enable = 1 and d.status = 2 UNION ALL select r.name,r.reason,r.create_time as "createTime",'3' as type from resources r where r.enable = 1 and r.status = 2 UNION ALL select m.name,m.reason,m.create_time as "createTime",'4' as type from merchant m where m.enable = 1 and m.status = 2 UNION ALL select p.name,p.reason,p.create_time as "createTime",'5' as type from project p where p.enable = 1 and p.create_by = #{userId} and p.status = 2 ORDER BY createTime DESC
where enable = 1 and status = 1 and sign_in = 2 and NOW() >= end_time
